promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young strong ladybug psychic-type pokemon with dark wings. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or ladybug. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptsect, a a chibi young strong ladybug psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Psychic Leap, Grope. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ladybug", "psychic" or "Cryptsect". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, ladybug-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Cryptsect, this chibi sentinel of the ancient catacombs, employ its Grope skill to maneuver through the dark. With its Psychic Leap, it bypasses obstacles and bewilders foes. The labyrinth seems like home for this strong, tiny tot.
